title: Morning Joe 1/28/21
description: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell on Wednesday said he would listen to the evidence in former President Trump's impeachment trial. The Morning Joe panel discusses McConnell's strategy for keeping the GOP together.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell on Wednesday said he would listen to the evidence in former President Trump's impeachment trial. The Morning Joe panel discusses McConnell's strategy for keeping the GOP together.
